title: New: Oyinda – Flatline
content:
Have long made my admiration for Oyinda’s music pretty clear; her debut EP was a mix of smooth, intoxicating pop numbers, whilst the material released so far this year sees her pushing the boat out a little more.

Flatline, her latest single, is a sleek, expertly produced gem, landing somewhere between the sultry pop of George Maple, and the dancefloor ready AlunaGeorge. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
